title: Ranked Bronze Team With Coach
body:
I am coaching a ranked team for bronze and I am looking for the following:

Support
Mid
Top
Jung

replies.body: Awesome guys, add me ingame and we can start playing! Probs help the pre 30's level up
Add me if your still looking for players, cheers usually, mid, jung or top preferably

If you are still accepting people (**I guess you are not, but might as well try**). I can either TOP (Darius, Garen, Vi, Jayce and Riven), MID (Jayce, AP Ez, Ekko, Heimer... etc.) or ADC (Varus, Twitch, Ez)
Hi i main zed im s3 id like do join your squad , i can top too. im a very dependent mid laner
i main afk. can in i join b0ss

Ay, if ya still looking for players i'm currently in Bronze 3, I main Jung with Shyvana but I can use just about every champ with a lil practice. Add us if theres still space, cheers. IGN: CastielZaim11

I don't know if you guys are looking for players anymore or not but I am a main mid currently in B3. I play a lot of jayce, xerath and ahri as well as orianna and a few others but not as commonly :)

Here is my match history if you are interested :) 
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/51217849
Hey if your still looking for players, i would like to join, Was Gold 5 in Season 4 and i main top/adc/jungle but i can play a pretty good mid too my in game name is Volitch

can I please join? i'm bronze 2
i can support, adc, jungle and top.
for jungle i main vi, For top i main fiora, for support i main tank thresh and for adc i main quinn

Add me PREETY R main top kennen
lvl 30 and sounds fun
main support look at my match history {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:37}}

I've recently taken up maining the ADC role and it's been going well for me (normals :P), though previously I've never had a set role I played, but if there is still spot for a top laner then I'll gladly take up that role. 

Top Preferred Champions: 
Renekton, Mao Kai, Kassadin, Jayce.

I can also take up a Sub position, seeing as I won't be playing anywhere near as much as I do now once the school term starts.
I beg you DECHE please don't coach, you'll teach them the wrong %%%%. I know this purely from your match history...

I am unsure why you would make this post. If you think I am unfit for coaching you have the right to say it. But making a post like this is not helping other players get better, instead it is breaking down the community. If you have offered to coach them instead then by all means go ahead, atleast that is helping the other players.


> And FYI I have a better win rate than you. You are 50% I am 52%.
Jg and Mid main Im silver though
Do we HAVE TO be in bronze?
we are all bronze at heart :P
Il join if you need a jungler :){{champion:254}}
don't forget me
I would be very interested in this, I play top (Gnar, Jayce, Riven, Maokai, Irelia). Only level 23 though so far, which is probably a dealbreaker.

I has wants top.

Better give me it.

 Zed/Riven/Jayce/Yasuo/Nasus/Mundo/Shen/Jax

My main is on another server but my account here is almost level 30 (29 now).
I usually main support.
- Ngau
I am Silver IV, though interested if you are going to be serious. I added you on the client. I'm a Mid.
